testcaseName: Patient is 3 years old and was administered Pfizer's 5-11 years Covid-19 vaccine formulation

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when a child that is less than 5 years old and is administered a dose of the Pfizer's 5-11 years Covid-19 (CVX 218) vaccine formulation, that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
